name: Bareek Seviyan
description: Fine, crispy gram flour noodles (sev), lightly spiced. Perfect for adding crunch to chaats or enjoying as a standalone snack.

name: Besan Papri
description: Crispy, savory wafers made from gram flour (besan). Ideal for chaats or as a crunchy accompaniment to your tea.

name: Bhel Puri
description: A delightful mix of puffed rice, sev, papri, and savory spices. A classic Indian street food snack base, ready for your fresh additions.

name: Bombay Nimko
description: A classic spicy and tangy Bombay mix, featuring a variety of savory noodles, lentils, peanuts, and spices. An all-time favorite.

name: Chaat Papri
description: Small, round, crispy fried flour discs, an essential ingredient for making delicious chaats like Dahi Papri Chaat.

name: Chips
description: Classic, crispy potato chips, lightly salted and perfect for snacking anytime, anywhere.

name: Cookies Nimko
description: Savory, bite-sized nimko cookies, mildly spiced and perfect with tea. A delightful twist on traditional nimko.

name: Crush Nimko
description: A finely crushed mixture of various savory nimko items, perfect as a topping or for adding a crunchy texture to dishes.

name: Daal Biji Nimko
description: Crunchy and savory nimko made from roasted or fried lentil seeds, seasoned with traditional spices.

name: Daal Chana Nimko
description: Crispy roasted or fried split chickpeas (chana dal), lightly spiced for a wholesome and protein-rich snack.

name: Daal Moong Nimko
description: Light and crispy fried moong lentils, seasoned with salt and mild spices. A popular and healthy snack.

name: Daal Sev Nimko
description: Crispy gram flour noodles (sev) enriched with the goodness of lentils, offering a unique flavor and texture.

name: Dahi Pulki
description: Small, savory lentil dumplings (phulki), perfect for soaking in yogurt to make Dahi Phulki. These are the dry, ready-to-soak version.

name: Gathiya Nimko
description: A popular Gujarati snack, these are thick, soft, and savory gram flour strands, often enjoyed with tea.

name: Hyderabadi Nimko
description: A spicy and flavorful nimko mix inspired by Hyderabadi cuisine, featuring a blend of sev, nuts, and aromatic spices.

name: Medium Sev Nimko
description: Crispy gram flour noodles (sev) of medium thickness, perfectly spiced for a satisfying crunch.

name: Meetha Chewra Nimko
description: A sweet and savory snack made from flattened rice (poha/chewra), nuts, and raisins, with a hint of sweetness.

name: Mix Nimko
description: A delightful assortment of various savory fried snacks, offering a mix of textures and flavors in every bite. A classic crowd-pleaser.

name: Mongra Nimko
description: Small, round, and crunchy lentil balls, seasoned with spices. A traditional and tasty snack.

name: Mota Sev Nimko
description: Thick, crispy gram flour noodles (sev), robustly flavored and perfect for those who enjoy a heartier crunch.

name: Mughlai Nimko
description: A rich and royal savory mix inspired by Mughlai cuisine, often containing nuts, raisins, and a blend of aromatic spices.

name: Namak Paray
description: Crispy, diamond-shaped savory fried crackers, lightly seasoned with salt and carom seeds. A traditional tea-time snack.

name: Namkeen Chewra Nimko
description: A savory snack made from flattened rice (poha/chewra), often mixed with peanuts, curry leaves, and spices.

name: Parsley Nimko
description: A unique savory snack infused with the fresh, herbaceous flavor of parsley, offering a delightful twist to traditional nimko.

name: Popcorn
description: Classic, fluffy popcorn, lightly salted or with a hint of savory seasoning. The perfect movie-time or anytime snack.

name: Sabut Moong Nimko
description: Crispy fried whole moong beans (green gram), lightly spiced for a crunchy and protein-packed snack.

name: Safaid Channy Nimko
description: Crunchy fried white chickpeas (kabuli chana), seasoned with a blend of savory spices. A hearty and flavorful snack.

name: Sahi Nimko
description: A 'royal' or premium nimko mix, featuring a special selection of high-quality ingredients, nuts, and exquisite spices.

name: Shakarpary Nimko
description: Sweet, diamond-shaped fried flour crisps, often coated with a light sugar glaze. A delightful sweet nimko treat.

name: Slanty
description: Light, crispy, and uniquely shaped puffed snacks, often flavored with tangy or spicy seasonings. A fun and addictive snack.
